20110113150703.000|20110113150705.000|CC1|ADDRESSING THAT DEBATE?         
20110113150705.000|20110113150706.000|CC1|>> HE SAID FLATLY LAST NIGHT,   
20110113150706.000|20110113150708.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT THE RESULT OF THE

20110113150715.000|20110113150716.000|CC1|THIS COUNTRY, BUT IT IS THAT    
20110113150716.000|20110113150719.000|CC1|CIVIL DISCOURSE AND TALK THAT WE
20110113150719.000|20110113150720.000|CC1|NEED TO FACE THE CHALLENGES     
20110113150720.000|20110113150721.000|CC1|AHEAD OF US IN A WAY THAT WILL  
20110113150721.000|20110113150722.000|CC1|MAKE THE VICTIMS OF THIS        
20110113150722.000|20110113150724.000|CC1|SHOOTING PROUD.
